text: Alfredo G. Marañon Jr. (December 21, 1935 - October 1, 2020) was a Filipino PDP–Laban politician. He was Governor of Negros Occidental from 2010 to 2019. He was Mayor of Sagay City between 2001 to 2010. Marañon was born in Sagay City. Marañon died on October 1, 2020 in Bacolod, Philippines from heart disease, aged 84. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Filipino mayors Category:Politicians from Western Visayas Category:People from Negros Occidental
title: Alfredo Marañon
